text: tavada, numbalage biriyan aturin kisivek (agamen ivatva) numbala hæra dama deva pratiksepakayin veta giye nam pasuva (yuddhayakadi) numbala jaya gattehu nam (numbalage) biriyan hæra dama giya ovunata ovun viyadam kala ha samana deyak laba denu. tavada numbala kavara ayaku visvasa karannan lesa sitinnoda evan allahta biya bætimat vanu
